name: Newscaster
text: Good morning citizens. Scientists and researchers have been fast at work to analyze this deadly virus and they have concluded that the infection rate's been skryrocketing and that the number of dead people have increased-
(You hear a vociferous scream for from outside your home.)
(You sneaked out of the house to check it out.)
(You saw your neighbor being attacked by a person who's typically sterotyped as a Karen.)
(Just looming in the back, there was a person with pale skin and green eyes, seemingly planning to harm other people.)

name: You
text: [This is a Volatile, the infected that I was fighting off yesterday.]
